Description: Install all project dependencies listed in package.json
Start the application (depends on project configuration)
Start the app in development mode (often with hot reloading)
Run all tests using Jest or the configured test runner
Run tests in watch mode (reruns on file change)
Generate code coverage report using Jest
Run ESLint to check code for style/formatting errors
Run your custom database migration script
Run a development migration with Prisma and generate client
Launch a GUI to inspect and edit your database
Run manual XP and level system test script
